title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions until al dente.
While pasta cooks, heat a large skillet over medium heat and cook pancetta until crispy, about 5-7 minutes.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, cheeses, and plenty of black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining the spaghetti.
Add hot spaghetti to the skillet with pancetta and toss quickly.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: 500g boneless chicken thighs, cut into chunks
instructions: In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, paprika, turmeric, garam masala, garlic, ginger, and salt to make marinade.
Add chicken chunks and marinate for at least 1 hour, preferably overnight.
Preheat grill or oven to medium-high. Thread chicken onto skewers and grill for 10-12 minutes until charred and cooked through.
Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until golden, about 8-10 minutes.
Add coriander, remaining cumin, chili powder, and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Stir in crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add grilled chicken and cream. Simmer for another 5-7 minutes until sauce thickens.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan bread.

title: Classic Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce with homemade Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 1 large head romaine lettuce, torn into pieces
instructions: For the dressing: In a bowl, mash garlic and anchovies (if using) into a paste.
Whisk in mustard, Worcestershire, and lemon juice.
Slowly whisk in mayonnaise and olive oil until emulsified. Season with salt and pepper.
In a large bowl, toss romaine lettuce with dressing until well coated.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese, toss again.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper on top.
